title: DOUBT
content: Seniors, does PES actually provide any sort of scholarships for scoring high, as they told they did during the PESSAT counselling?

comments.body: Why do u think theyre lying to u?
lol i dont, i just want to know if there are people who actually got it?

yes. for being in the top 5%, you'll get half of your fee back

for being in the next 20% you'll get 0.4 or your fee back

for 7.5 or something i think you get 2k. last one im not sure though. but i can confirm the first two are accurate
Isn't it 40% for being in the next 20%?
is this for sgpa or cgpa? Whoever gets like 9.5+ at the end of year, can avail this scholarship- is it like that?
Yes but you need minimum 7.5 sgpa

the 5% is cgpa. the remaining 20% is sgpa. 

but it mostly does not make a difference as people who top one sem tend to top the others as well. there's probably a few people out of thousand to whom this distinction mattered
so if u top the first semester, you get the scholarhsip then itself or is it after the year ends?
you get it in the middle of the next sem
